definition: name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: The con man has used my name card to cheat people and customers.
sentences.chinese: 这个骗徒拿我的名片欺骗大众和消费者。

sentences.english: The magnetic-levitation train ride from the international airport to the city is the perfect metaphor for Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 从国际机场到市区的磁悬浮列车线是上海的最佳名片。

sentences.english: "Hancheng pepper" has become Hancheng with big business card.
sentences.chinese: “韩城花椒”已成为韩城响当当的名片。

sentences.english: Design and production of brochures, booklets , name cards etc.
sentences.chinese: 各种出版物的设计及印务，如小册子，手册，名片等。

sentences.english: The box was corded, the card nailed on .
sentences.chinese: 箱子用绳捆好，上面钉了名片。

sentences.english: I’m the manager of the import division of XYZ Co.Ltd. Here is my card.
sentences.chinese: 我是XYZ有限公司的进口部经理，这是我的名片。

sentences.english: With personal business card or related proofs to achieve free passport.
sentences.chinese: 凭个人名片或相关职业证明获取免费入场证。

sentences.english: One day she saw his bi-lingual name cards and howled with laughter.
sentences.chinese: 一天，她看到了他的双语名片，哈哈大笑。

sentences.english: Finally, Huadu will be famous for passion fruit, therefore forming a brand effect.
sentences.chinese: 把百香果打造成花都的“名片”之一，形成品牌效应。

sentences.english: Followed by a thank-you letter with name card.
sentences.chinese: 附寄一封有自己名片的感谢信。

sentences.english: Just give me your number and I'll jot it down on the back of one of mine.
sentences.chinese: 告诉我你的号码，我把它记在我名片的背后就成。

sentences.english: In business, it is common to give people your name card.
sentences.chinese: 作生意时通常会将你的名片给别人。

sentences.english: Hi, I'm Abbie, this is my calling card.
sentences.chinese: 我是艾比，这是我的名片。

sentences.english: The attendees mingled, exchanged calling cards and traded cameras for photographs.
sentences.chinese: 与会者交杂著，互相交换名片与相互拍照留念。

sentences.english: Design Business cards ready for print in high quality format.
sentences.chinese: 名片设计为高品质的格式打印做好准备。

definition: to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes
to reveal/to display/to show/to exhibit sth
